mapper.delete:
update zx_sa_ProjectSettleAudit set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and id in
#{model.id}
mapper.select: SELECT sp.department_id AS orgID, sp.department_name AS orgName FROM sys_project sp WHERE sp.del_flag = '0' AND sp.department_id IN ( SELECT firstID FROM zx_gcsg_ct_contract WHERE del_flag = '0' )

SELECT ct_contract_id AS contractID, contractNo, contractName, secondId, secondName, settleType, isDeduct FROM zx_gcsg_ct_contract WHERE del_flag = '0' AND firstId = #{orgID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND contractType = 'P2' AND contractStatus != '3'
mapper.update: update zx_sa_ProjectSettleAudit set thisPayAmt = #{thisPayAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalPayAmt = #{totalPayAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user = #{modifyUser}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
